titleStmt.title: A few words minding the representative of the Common-Wealth of England how they may pay their armies, and ease the people of their taxes, which have a long time been a heavy burthen upon the poorer sort. / William Banes.
titleStmt.author: Banes, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold at the Blackspread-Eagle near the west end of Pauls,
